survey_name: Local Park Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from community members about their usage of local parks and their satisfaction with park facilities and services.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit your local park?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple frequency scale to gauge park visitation habits.

script.question_text: How often do you visit your local park?

questions.question_text: What activities do you typically engage in when visiting the park? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who visit the park at least 'A few times a year'.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse park uses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.

script.question_text: What activities do you typically engage in when visiting the park? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who visit the park at least 'A few times a year'.

questions.question_text: Please rate your overall satisfaction with the park facilities (e.g., cleanliness, maintenance, safety).
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who visit the park at least 'A few times a year'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: Please rate your overall satisfaction with the park facilities (e.g., cleanliness, maintenance, safety).
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who visit the park at least 'A few times a year'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your local park?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your local park?

questions.question_text: Have you attended any organized events or programs at the park in the past year?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who visit the park at least 'A few times a year'.
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to measure event participation.
